Name: ModBots
About the game: In the far future, humanity has been victorious in the great war against machines. Now keeping the remaining robots in storage, some have figured that the coming destruction of them may as well be entertaining to the masses. In underground fighting arenas, players play as these robots, fighting against smaller robots and advanced gladiators to the enjoyment of the onlookers. Battle! Fight through hoards of enemy gladiator bots in the arena either solo or with friends! Upgrade! After each round, you will have the opportunity to collect loot to upgrade your bot for the next round to come. Survive! Survive wave after wave collecting new weapons and upgrading your botâ€™s abilities to vie for supremacy in the arena!
